name: Talk Vincent
_source: speak;Vincent;Woah, Simon, you look terrible.{w}{br}Are you alright?
speak;Vincent;I mean, I can't blame you.{w}{br}Watching your castle be taken like that...
speak;Simon;Look, I'm sorry, Vincent.{w}{br}I'm just,{w} having trouble processing this, you know?
speak;Vincent;Anyway, Morrissey wants to see you.{w}{br}I can tell him you're busy, if you -
speak;Simon;No, I'll see him.{w}{br}I'll just feel worse if I lie in bed all day.
